text:
If you have an issue with this then I don’t have the energy to fight and propose to bank the room unless you decide you want to use it without the kids
I’m not looking to do a back and forth on this with quick response times.
The comment of 21 hours dark. If there is no emergency then that should be the norm if not longer.
Message 87 of 4024
Start a separate thread. Agree let’s minimize the back and forth and expected response time.
I’ll review Dr. Brown guidelines but she had expected response time in there. It feels like you are tracking when I read the emails and then expecting an
immediate response.
The communication should be limited to normal hours without expectation for calls, texts, emails early morning or late evenings.
Sent:12/28/2023 at 07:11 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 07:12 AM)
Subject:Re: Therapy Roundup
Message 88 of 4024
If you are proposing that I expect that we go 21 hours without so much as a reply, I’ll probably ask we use another method of communication. You
are in my home and have most everything I own. We can talk about the other later. But that is not going to work.
Sent:12/28/2023 at 07:11 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 07:14 AM)
Subject:Re: Spring Break (not urgent)
Message 89 of 4024
Last night after I proposed setting mutual expectations that you would not be on here at night or day. And now you just said it will be a minimum of
21 hours. I have tried to work with you but you refuse because you were angry about an email that I sent in good faith. You are not working with me.
Sent:12/28/2023 at 07:14 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 07:14 AM)
Subject:Re: Therapy Roundup
Message 90 of 4024
See email communication protocols.
If you need access to your things, it has been 6 months. Let’s arrange a date/time for you to remove your items. I need to be in a home that I do not
feel threatened. We are not in a nesting situation.
If you refuse options are to sell the home now or I move out with the boys and you move in.
Sent:12/28/2023 at 07:27 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2023 at 07:28 AM)
Subject:Re: Therapy Roundup
Attachments:IMG_9307.PNG (456 KB)
